item.title: My opinion on Vibe Coding
item.description:
Now…

Vibe Coding...

It’s a… subject thats for sure. Im going to just come out and say Vibe Coding != Software Engineering. That is a fact, you saying something and then doing a little Ctrl+C/Ctrl+V action isn’t programming, it’s prompting, and I mean REALLY prompting, endless amounts of times. Over. And. Now I now you probably don’t care what I have to say about, but you should! Honestly, a buggy, insecure app that breaks when you try to add a new button because ChatGPT/Grok/Claude/Gemini/whateverthefuck forgot what it was doing or though it’s a exotic bird is WAY better than a app that you spent time, effort, and (maybe) passion into that actual (sometimes) works! Just learn to program. That’s all i gotta say, stop hyping AI like it’s gonna make you a buncha money. Though, i do think using AI as a tool and not another brain is great! Work smarter not harder everyone (granted that you know what the “smart” is!)
